ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 2
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Animated Celebration Presents The Scheimer Barrier
ComicInfo.Summary: Mad scientist Fontana plops Kirk, Spock, and company in a strangely familiar American high school in the middle of a strangely familiar love triangle between Artie, Bessie, and Verona. The crew must now tangle with a mad scientist and teen emotions... while searching both river and dale to find a way back to their own universe!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:59:30. [CVDB1014665]
ComicInfo.Characters: Fontana, James T. Kirk, M'Ress, Nyota Uhura, Spock
